body:
https://ruqqus.com/post/1z1w/ruqqus-2174-patch--more-notification/6iiy

>Nice. Could you make the thread link (Next to "Comment reply:") go directly to the full comments for a thread, rather than the comment that was responded to? The permalink and context buttons already provide that, so it'd be nice to be able to go straight to the full thread.
body_html:
https://ruqqus.com/post/1z1w/ruqqus-2174-patch--more-notification/6iiy

Nice. Could you make the thread link (Next to "Comment reply:") go directly to the full comments for a thread, rather than the comment that was responded to? The permalink and context buttons already provide that, so it'd be nice to be able to go straight to the full thread.

guild.description:
Changes that aren't announced in +changelog or +ruqqus

Post whatever you notice (it doesn't have to be an important change, even changes in punctuation/spelling are ok)

https://github.com/ruqqus/ruqqus

Update on 2021-01-29:

If you want to be the GM of this guild, make a post here.
guild.description_html:
Changes that aren't announced in +changelog or +Ruqqus

Post whatever you notice (it doesn't have to be an important change, even changes in punctuation/spelling are ok)

https://github.com/ruqqus/ruqqus

If you want to be the GM of this guild, make a post here.
guild.name: OtherChanges

title: For comments show in the inbox/user profiles: thread link goes to full comments page rather than comment it was responded to
